name: Dogecoin To The Moon
description:
Dogecoin To The Moon Hello guys, Dogecoin to the moon is now playable in web browsers 🚀 Originally made for mobile/portrait orientation, some elements may not be well adapted and there can be some glitches 👾 If you like the game, please download and rate it on the app store, it really helps pushing it to new people, driving adoption 🥰 It's completely FREE, I'll make no money out of it.
Let's top chart the app stores to drive adoption of dogecoin!
Share it massively to help promote ÐOGE!
